data.title: Blog Archives
data.meta_description: Today I'm going to show you some charities of basketball players. Enjoy it! ​ Shaun Livingston: The point-guard of the Golden State Warriors has given one million dollars to the school that he...
data.text:
Today I'm going to show you some charities of basketball players. Enjoy it!

​Shaun Livingston: The point-guard of the Golden State Warriors has given one million dollars to the school that he went when he was a child. Shaun is not very famous, he doesn´t plays like a superstar, so he hasn't got the salary of a superstar. His salary is 5.3 millions each year, for three years, so 1 million dolars for Livingston is a lot. The school has recived 3.2 million dollars in total, 1 million of Shaun and 2.2 millions for other people. He said that he wants to share his money with the people that belives in him when he was a child. Good job Shaun!

Michael Jordan: The legend of basketball Michael Jordan has denounced two supermarkets (Dominick's and Jewel Osco) because they have used Michael Jordan's name. He has won 8.9 million dollars for the first supermarket. The prize of the demand of the second supermarket is undeterminated. He wins around 9 million dollars, so he has donated to the childs of Chicago, his city. Jordan worries about the health and the wellness about Chicago's childs. MIchael doesn't care about the money of this donation because he has won 1.2 billion dollars in all his carrer and he continues winning money with the publicity and so. He has done a a lot of donations a part from this one. Michael has a very very big heart!

Stephen Curry: The best pont-guard of Golden State Warriors and one of the bests players on the league Stephen Curry, has made a charity. He with his wife Ayesha and his little daughter Riley has given pantries to 400 families. In the pantries where some food, wáter, some money to survive... Curry said that he wants to help transporting the pantries to the truck, a part from buy the food, the wáter and put money. This special event is part on the "Boxing Day", a special day organizated by the Golden State Warriors, the team of Curry. He has a very big heart!

Today I'm going to explain somethig different. Today I'm going to show you the girlfriends of some basketball players and some information and photos about them. Enjoy it!

​1- Teyana Taylor: Teyana Taylor it's one of the famous girlfriends. Its the girldfriend of the Cleveland Cavaliers player Iman Shumpert. Teyana is an African-American and Trinidadian descendent. She is a famous R&B and hip hop singer, but she is a songwritter, very good dancer, choreographer and model too. Teyana is one year younger tan Iman, she's 25. They are not married, but she is mother of one child (Tayla Shumpert) in common with Iman, but he has other children from other relationships. Teyana has been in MTV's, she has been working with famous artists like Pusha-T, Kanye West.. Actually she has 80.000 fans on YouTube and more in other social networks. She's growing up like a Singer.

2- Savannah Brinson: Savannah Brinson is the wife of the King of the NBA, LeBron James. She is one year younger tan LeBron, as Teyana Teylor with Iman Shumpert. Savannah is 30 years old and LeBron is 31. Savannah is not as famous as Teyana, she is famous because of her husband, they fall in love since the high school. LeBrond and Savannah have 2 sons and 1 daughter in common (Bryce Maximus James, LeBron James Jr and Zhuri James). The passion of Savannah is designing furniture and home decor.

3- Ayesha Curry: Ayesha Curry is the wife of the point guard, the best player of the Golden State Warriors. Ayesha is one of the most famous basketball players wife, as Teyana Taylor. She Canadian-American, from Toronto. Ayesha is a celebrity cooker, she has a TV show called "Cooking with the Currys, Ayesha's homemade". She is a businesswoman too, she write some kitchen books, model and a very good actress. Ayesha has appeared in some TV shows like "Good Luck Charlie" or "Hannah Montana". Ayesha, as Teyana Taylor and Savannah Brinson, is one year younger tan her husband, she is 27. Ayesha is mother of two cute daughters, Riley Curry and Ryan Carson Curry.
